derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: perhaps from crab or crab's eyes, denoting the lowest throw (two ones) at dice

entry.tran: 错误的;质量差的;蹩脚的
entry.def: If you describe something as crap, you think that it is wrong or of very poor quality.
Crap is sometimes used to refer to faeces.
To crap means to get rid of faeces from your body.

entry.tran: (主要流行于北美洲的)双骰子赌博游戏
entry.def: Craps or crap is a gambling game, played mainly in North America, in which you throw two dice and bet what the total will be.

example.ex: I'll shoot some craps or play some blackjack.
example.tran: 我要掷几把骰子，玩几把21点纸牌。

means.word_mean: 1. when two dice are thrown and both come up showing one spot the results is called `craps' or `snake eyes'
2. a gambling game using two dice
